name: World's Smallest 10000mAh Battery Pack? | Anker PowerCore 10000 Full Review
description:
Anker very kindly sent me their latest portable power pack - the Anker PowerCore 10000.  This is my unboxing video and review, to see how long this will power the GoPro!

PowerCore 10000: http://amzn.to/2q9Lcjo
PowerLine+: http://amzn.to/2pZP777
